Plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.
Title: The Graduate
Writer: Calder Willingham (screenplay), Buck Henry (screenplay), Charles Webb (based on the novel by)
Actors: Anne Bancroft, Dustin Hoffman, Katharine Ross, William Daniels
tomatoConsensus: The music, the performances, the precision in capturing the post-college malaise -- The Graduate's coming-of-age story is indeed one for the ages.
